abstract: Some investors defrauded by epic swindler Bernard Madoff on Tuesday added accounting firm KPMG, JPMorgan Chase and Bank of New York Mellon to a civil lawsuit in a New York court.
snippet: Some investors defrauded by epic swindler Bernard Madoff on Tuesday added accounting firm KPMG, JPMorgan Chase and Bank of New York Mellon to a civil lawsuit in a New York court.
lead_paragraph: Some investors defrauded by Bernard Madoff on Tuesday added the accounting firm KPMG, JPMorgan Chase and Bank of New York Mellon to a civil lawsuit in a New York court, the lawyer Joseph Cotchett told Reuters.

headline.main: Madoff Investors Add KPMG and Banks to Suit
